item.title: Tempting...
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Leo T. First day at work. First day in my old office for over nine months. On my desk is a roll of paper. I chat with the guy I’m sharing office with, and he tells me that my colleague in the office next door left it for me. Said colleague must have heard us talking, and enters the office. –The organizer gave it to me, and I brought it back for you.
